column1: al-ṣan‘ah. istihlāl. tawshīḥ mkhl‘ al-basīṭ li’abī bikrun bn zahr

column2: idhā jā’ak al-ḥabīb āiftaḥ luh bābak

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. istihlālun wa‘irāq ‘urb. tawshīḥ muqtaḍab lābin khātimah
al-ṣan‘ah. istihlāl. tawshīḥun liḥamdūnin bn al-ḥājj
al-ṣan‘ah. istihlāl. tawshīḥ raml lābin sahil
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ‘irāq al-‘urb. tawshīḥun limallak ghrnāẓh īūsf al-thālith
al-ṣan‘ah. raṣd al-dhayl. qaṣīdah. tkhmīs mkhl‘ al-basīṭ

column2: kam dhā urá qāri‘ ataytuh khāḍi‘
